Room.Name: Path to Saint Anne's Retreat
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the path between Saint Anne's and the Hafnia Mountain Road.
Room.LongDescription: A huge stone manor looms before you, almost a castle in size. There are twin towers at either end, and you see lights and activity in the windows of the west tower. The east tower is cold and dark in appearance. Nearby is a bell tower and a sign says ring for admittance.
